headline: US FDA restricts imports of some Viatris drugs made at India facility
summary: The FDA has issued a warning letter to Viatris related to its drug manufacturing facility in Indore in the central Indian state of Madhya Pradesh, the company said, without disclosing the specifics of the warning.  The 11 products will no longer be accepted into the U.S. until the warning letter is lifted, Viatris said in a statement.
